basics.name: Timothy Ricks
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Senior Backend Software Engineer with over a decade of experience in Python and Django. I specialize in designing and implementing scalable REST APIs, migrating monolithic applications to the cloud, and building robust, maintainable systems. My diverse background in finance and IT provides a unique perspective on solving complex business challenges with technology.

highlights: Architected and implemented new APIs using Python and Go to optimize outbound customer communications, improving system efficiency.
Developed and maintained core services with Flask and Temporal, ensuring reliable and scalable communication workflows.
Integrated critical third-party services, including AWS SES, Twilio, and HubSpot, to streamline communication and automate processes.
Principal engineer overseeing the development of a US DOJ grant-funded, web-based application providing tools to assist law enforcement in their investigation of reports of online child exploitation.

Led the conversion of legacy Java and PHP APIs into a single Python REST API using Django and Django Rest Framework, significantly simplifying the application's architecture and improving maintainability.
Spearheaded the migration of all on-premises hardware and software to AWS GovCloud, managing the configuration of load balancing, auto scaling, and rolling deployments.
Architected and implemented CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions, enabling zero-downtime deployments and ensuring continuous availability for the project.
Split a monolithic application into cloud-native, event-driven services using AWS Lambda, SQS, and Step Functions, enhancing application scalability and fault-tolerance.
Led and mentored a team of four developers and several graduate students in the development and maintenance of web-based tools.
